headline: Uber announces marketing deal for Channel Tunnel trains
summary: The transport app has formed a partnership with Gemini Trains, which is developing plans to launch international rail services from London St Pancras.

headline: J.P. Morgan Sees Long-Term Growth For Uber Technologies (UBER), Reiterates Buy Rating
summary: On May 20, J.P. Morgan analyst Doug Anmuth reiterated a Buy rating on Uber Technologies, Inc. (NYSE:UBER) and raised the price target to $105 from $92. The upgrades come after the company has signed multiple partnerships since the start of 2025 to advance its autonomous vehicle ambition. Anmuth met the management of Uber Technologies, Inc. […]

headline: Airbnb vs. Spain, Victoria's Secret, Uber stock hits record high
summary: Yahoo Finance host Julie Hyman tracks today's top moving stocks and biggest market stories in this Market Minute, including Spain ordering Airbnb (ABNB) to delist 65,000 holiday rentals, Victoria's Secret (VSCO) adopts a poison pill position to prevent a possible takeover, and Uber (UBER) shares reaching an all-time high. Stay up to date on the latest market action, minute-by-minute, with Yahoo Finance's Market Minute.

headline: DBS reiterates Buy on Uber Technologies (UBER)
summary: On May 19, DBS analyst Nashrullah Putra Sulaeman reiterated a Buy rating on Uber Technologies Inc. (NYSE:UBER) with a price target of $95. The analyst highlighted Uber’s strong financial performance, particularly its better-than-expected adjusted EBITDA in its recently reported Q1 2025 results. Although Q1 revenue growth was on expected lines, operating performance benefited from mobility […]

headline: Best Stock to Buy Right Now: Uber vs. Lyft
summary: Uber Technologies and Lyft have strong market positions in the industry.  Meanwhile, Lyft has achieved profitability.  Uber Technologies (NYSE: UBER) and Lyft (NASDAQ: LYFT) have been longtime competitors in the ride-sharing space.

headline: Billionaire Bill Ackman May Be the Next Warren Buffett, and 33% of His Portfolio Is Invested in 2 Brilliant Stocks
summary: Hedge fund manager Bill Ackman hopes to emulate Warren Buffett by turning Howard Hughes Holdings into a "modern-day Berkshire Hathaway."  Ackman's hedge fund, Pershing Square Capital Management, currently has 33% of its portfolio invested in two stocks: Uber and Alphabet.  Uber is uniquely positioned to benefit from autonomous driving technology, and the stock looks attractive at its current valuation.

headline: 3 Quality Compounders to Target This Week
summary: Quality compounders are well-oiled machines. Their competitive advantages allow them to make profits consistently and reinvest them into projects that generate even more profits, creating a virtuous cycle of returns.

headline: 'I Was Stuck With A $50 Uber Bill, And 28 10-Year-Old Kids Pointing And Laughing,' Says An Embarrassed Cybertruck Owner After A Breakdown
summary: A Tesla (NASDAQ:TSLA) Cybertruck owner took to Facebook to vent his frustration after a front trunk malfunction turned into a full-blown breakdown that left him stranded—and humiliated—in front of a crowd of kids.
